title: SF_GuardLocking_2 (FunctionBlock)
text:
FUNCTION_BLOCK SF_GuardLocking_2
This FB controls an entrance to a hazardous area via an interlocking guard with guard locking (âfour state interlockingâ).

rows:
Monitors the guard interlocking. Can be connected to the
GuardOut of the SF_Guard FB. FALSE: Guard open. TRUE: Guard
closed and guarded area safe.

rows.Name: Ready
rows.Comment:
Activation of the FB. TRUE indicates that the FB is
activated and the outputs results are valid, FALSE the FB is
not active and the program is not executed.

rows:
Interface to hazardous area which must be stopped. FALSE: No
safe state. TRUE: Safe state.

Signal to unlock the guard. FALSE: Close guard. TRUE: Unlock
guard.

Output indicating that the FB is active and the primary
safety function is demanded (e.g. related to the safety
